text: Matti Helge Ranin (21 November 1926 – 24 November 2013) was a Finnish actor. He was well known for his role as Captain Kariluoto in Edvin Laine's The Unknown Soldier. Ranin was born in Tampere, Finland. He died on 24 November 2013 in Helsinki from natural causes, aged 87.Näyttelijä Matti Ranin kuollut ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Finnish stage actors Category:Finnish television actors Category:People from Tampere
title: Matti Ranin
